definitions.text: a slow longitudinal movement or deformation
a pen that is fenced so that young animals can enter but adults cannot
a slow mode of locomotion on hands and knees or dragging the body
examples: a crawl was all that the injured man could manage
the traffic moved at a creep

definitions.text: move slowly; in the case of people or animals with the body near the ground
examples: The crocodile was crawling along the riverbed
..stead of sneaking around spying on the neighbor's house

definitions.text: grow or spread, often in such a way as to cover (a surface)
examples: ivy crept over the walls of the university buildings
